---
title: "SPP for SSP"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
SSP <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/SSP.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
ssp <- ts(SSP[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+121/365.25)
ssp %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(ssp))
```

```{r}
training_ssp <- subset(ssp, end=length(ssp)-5)
test_ssp <- subset(ssp, start=length(ssp)-4)
fc_training_ssp<-forecast(training_ssp)
fc_training_ssp %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_ssp)
```

```{r}
fc_training_ssp
```

```{r}
fc_ssp<-forecast(ssp)
fc_ssp %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_ssp
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_ssp)
```

```{r}
tail(ssp)
min(ssp)
max(ssp)
which.min(ssp)
```
